nodes.text: A male bounty hunter once led an effort to crack down on a possible equipment leak at Botha Ammunitions Corporation on the planet Kothlis, which the Galactic Empire wanted stopped. After a group of Rebel Alliance agents inadvertently smuggled blaster power packs and blaster gas canisters out of Bothamco, disguised as recyclables, the bounty hunter dispatched several mercenaries to stop them.
